Others: England and Slovenia played a 0-0 draw in their Euro 2024 Group C match.
England fans were supportive but booed at halftime and after the game due to the team's lackluster performance.
Gareth Southgate's team qualified for the last 16, but their performance raised concerns about their ability to create chances.
Kobbie Mainoo and Cole Palmer made positive contributions as substitutes.
England will face a yet-to-be-determined third-place team in the last 16.
